Hi. I'm Josh Carson

Front End Developer.

About me

I am a Front End Developer who approaches learning with a hands-on first approach. My time in the trades has forced me to become a detail-oriented, creative problem-solver. When I’m not programming, you’ll find me training (or hugging) my dog, cooking new dishes or playing old GameBoy games on an emulator.

  • CSS

  • JavaScript

  • React
